item.title: Issues re Spring Cloud Netflix @EnableCircuitBreaker, @EnableHystrix
item.description: Objective Clarify use of Spring Cloud Netflix @EnableCircuitBreaker, @EnableHystrix Target Audience Developers new to Spring Cloud Platform Source Documents Microservice Architecture Spring Cloud Spring Cloud Netflix Hystrix finagle javaslang-circuitbreaker @EnableHystrix @EnableCircuitBreaker hystrix-javanica Summary Two existing Spring Cloud Netflix annotations to enable the circuit breaker pattern exist. At this time the documentation is not clear as to the distinction in behaviour. Result Use @EnableHystrix to implement the circuit breaker pattern specifically with Hystrix on the classpath.
